name: Warm Indie
description: Soft, naturalistic A24 aesthetic. Golden hour warmth, 35mm texture.

settings.colorPalette: Warm earth tones, muted pastels, golden yellows, soft greens. Lifted blacks with slight fade. Think Kodak Portra 400 color science.
settings.lighting: Soft natural light — window light, golden hour, overcast diffusion. Minimal artificial lighting. When practicals are used, warm tungsten only.
settings.lensPreferences: Spherical 35mm with visible film grain, 28mm-50mm range. Moderate depth of field — backgrounds soft but readable. Slight vignetting.
settings.mood: Intimate, melancholic beauty, quiet contemplation. Bittersweet. The beauty of ordinary moments.
customDirectives: Visible film grain — not digital noise, organic 35mm texture
Natural skin tones — no beauty filter, show pores and imperfections
Practical locations over sets — the space should feel lived-in
Negative space in composition — let the frame breathe
Available light priority — if it looks 'lit', it's wrong
